VersionString.description: This string represents the version of the firmware image.
VersionString.longDescription: This property shall represent the manufacturer version of the firmware image.

Current.description: This object contains information about the version of a firmware image.

FirmwareRevision.description: This is the schema definition for the Firmware Version.  It is used as part of other schema.
FirmwareRevision.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the version of firmware for an SPMA implementation.

VersionString.description: This string represents the version of the firmware image.
VersionString.longDescription: This property shall represent the manufacturer version of the firmware image.

FWVersion.description: This object contains information about the version of a firmware image.
